sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Ski center will be closed 2/1 and 2/2.   Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.

Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail has been groomed for skate and classic skiing today, February 1, 2025 . There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Bucks Run survived! (thank you thermodynamics) Tracks are hard and fast.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: The red & blue trails were groomed up nicely after yesterday's snowfall. We skate skied both this morning while the current round of snow was falling which slowed things down a lot.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: All 8 lifts, Space Worm and the rope tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and will be groomed this morning with a track set.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: It's a cold, clear and beautiful morning at Nub's. We had a small warm-up the last few days, but the snow did not get wet and the ski surface remains in exceptional shape. We should see some sunshine this morning, remember to bring your shades. NASTAR racing is open to the public from 12:30 to 2:30 PM. Pintail Peak lodge is open with a deli and espresso bar. Owen James will play the Nub's Pub at 3:30 PM. The Lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM with an hour break at 4:30 PM to groom for night skiing. Bundle up and make it a great day at Nub's Nob!
